name: agent-toolkit (softaworks)
description: [项目级] A curated collection of skills for AI coding agents. Skills are packaged instructions and scripts that extend agent capabilities across development, documentation, planning, and professional workflows.。来源: https://github.com/softaworks/agent-toolkit

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
A curated collection of skills for AI coding agents. Skills are packaged instructions and scripts that extend agent capabilities across development, documentation, planning, and professional workflows.

来源: https://github.com/softaworks/agent-toolkit
语言: Python
Stars: 625

name: agent-toolkit/agents 模块
description: [模块级] agent-toolkit 项目的 agents 模块 (source)。来源: https://github.com/softaworks/agent-toolkit

genes.title: agents 模块说明
genes.content:
> **Requires [Claude Code CLI](https://docs.anthropic.com/claude-code)** — These agents and commands are exclusive to Claude Code users.
>
> For full access, add the marketplace and install plugins:
> ```bash
> /plugin marketplace add softaworks/agent-toolkit
> /plugin install codex@agent-toolkit
> ```
